boardgame.name: Livingstone
boardgame.description: Africa, 1855...._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Scottish missionary, Dr Livingstone, has been researching African tribes and the flora and fauna of the area. As part of the Livingston Exploration, strategically set up tents in various regions while collecting gems found along the Zambezi River bank. Gain the most victory points and the favor of Queen Victoria to win!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the publisher: In this game you follow in the footsteps of David Livingstone to the roaring Victoria Falls. On your way you may want to try your luck in the Diamond mining or you may prefer to seek a more calculable risk._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The publisher promises an exciting and tactical family game, with a completely new dice mechanism._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gameplay overview:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Livingstone, the players travel through the river Zambezi and score points by making explorations to inland and finding valuable diamonds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the start of each round, players roll dice (2 per player), which determine where or in which quantity the actions the players take in the round will happen. Starting with the starting player for the current turn, the players pick dice (and take actions) clockwise one at a time. This is done until all the dice are distributed or nobody can pick another die; you can only ever pick a die that has a higher face value than the previous die you picked._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When picking a die, players can choose between four actions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take one special card (regardless of the die value); the special cards give players extra actions, bonuses and more; on the other hand, players can pick up a card that collapses the mine - in this case all the players lose their saved diamonds_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take money (amount is determined by the die value)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take diamonds (values 0_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;5, amount determined by the die value) from the bag; if you pick the white stone, you lose all diamonds you picked up this round_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Explore and set up a tent (row determined by the dice value); this costs players money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Additionally, the players can do the following actions at any time of their turn for free:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Sell diamonds for money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Contribute coins to the Queen; you have to inform other players you are doing this, but you do not have to specify the value - coins are stored in a chest in secret_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the turn, the boat is advanced (one column) further in the Zambezi river. The game ends when the boat cannot advance (eg. it has reached the last row)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players score points in two different ways:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; At the end of each turn, the current column is scored; each tent in a row scores the row amount (die/row value = amount of points)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; At the end of the game, each row is scored; the player with the majority of tents in each row scores points (lower die/row numbers score more points)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player who has contributed the least amount of money to the Queen cannot win the game, even if they collected the most points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2009 Vuoden Peli Family Game of the Year Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Played just once By Schmidt Spiele Shipping is: without shipping insurance: 4 EUR to Germany,10 EUR to EU and 15 EUR worldwide including shipping insurance: 7 EUR to Germany,18 EUR to EU, 31 EUR to Europe, 36 EUR to U.S. and Canada and 42 EUR to the rest of the world.

New in Shrink. £4.40 postage to UK. This is a German game, rules translations are available on the Geek I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a discount for purchases over £50. Please contact me for details. All items i list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.

Playroom Entertainment (PLE 86300) In this game you follow in the footsteps of David Livingstone to the roaring Victoria Falls. On your way you may want to try your luck in the Diamond mining or you may prefer to seek a more calculable risk.

This is the German version (made in Germany), not the US version (made in China). I ship everything via USPS Priority Mail flat rate boxes - with _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Fragile,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Keep Dry,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Do Not Bend_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; written on the boxes. The rate structure for those boxes is as follows: Shipping for games that will fit within a 8.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; X 5.25_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; X 1.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; box costs $4.95. Shipping for games that will fit within a 13.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; X 11.75_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; X 3.25_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; box costs $10.70. I can easily combine shipping if games will fit within these boxes. If they don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t, I can still combine shipping, but that is a little tricker. Thursdays are the days I get most of my shipping done, if that helps you.
new, in shrinkwrap

Brand new game, never opened - mint. I will ship FedEx Ground ($5 for shipping). Ask if you have any questions.
played a couple times

The box is in very good condition. All components are in excellent condition. Payment: With payment via PayPal or money order, I will ship upon receipt of payment. With personal check, I will wait one week after the check arrives to ship the game. Shipping Costs: I prefer to ship via the postal service, but I can also ship via UPS or FedEx upon request. I will only charge actual costs for shipping.
Played just a few times. Shipping is exact USPS cost.

The game: Schmidt (c). German, French and Italian rules. All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

***************************************************** Quinto Elemento Board Game Shop The best games at the best prize Please just send a message to know the total cost of the order, shipping included. ***************************************************** 1. Pricing and shipping: 1.1. Shipment is done with courier in the same day we receive the payment or the day after. 1.2. To check the total cost of an order, please send us a message with all the games you want. In this way we can automatically check the availability, timing and calculate the actual shipping cost! 2. Availability: Unfortunately BGG Market has no automatic availability update. For this reason it is possible that some items could be not available. But we will inform you soon regarding the restock timing and of course you are always free to cancel the order without any cost. 3. Payment conditions: A. Bank transfer B. Paypal For any further information, feel free to contact us! Davide
